mapper.select: SELECT invoice_account, invoice_account_name, invoice_bank_name FROM diyi_service_provider WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND id = #{param1} LIMIT 1

SELECT contact1_name, contact1_position, contact1_phone, contact1_mail, contact2_name, contact2_position, contact2_phone, contact2_mail FROM diyi_service_provider WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND id = #{param1} LIMIT 1

SELECT invoice_enterprise_name, invoice_tax_no, invoice_address, invoice_tel_no, invoice_bank_name, invoice_account_name, invoice_account FROM diyi_service_provider WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND id = #{param1} LIMIT 1

SELECT t1.id AS enterprise_id, t1.enterprise_name, t1.contact1_name, t1.contact1_phone, t1.enterprise_state, t1.create_time, (SELECT IF(online_aggrement_url <> NULL OR online_aggrement_url <> '', online_aggrement_url, paper_agreement_url) FROM diyi_agreement WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND agreement_type = 'ENTERPRISEJOINAGREEMENT' AND sign_state = 'SIGNED' AND enterprise_id = t1.id) AS join_contract, (SELECT IF(online_aggrement_url <> NULL OR online_aggrement_url <> '', online_aggrement_url, paper_agreement_url) FROM diyi_agreement WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND agreement_type = 'OTHERAGREEMENT' AND audit_state = 'APPROVED' AND enterprise_id = t1.id) AS commitment_letter FROM diyi_enterprise t1 WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0
AND t1.id = #{param1.enterpriseId}
AND t1.enterprise_name like concat('%', #{param1.enterpriseName}, '%')
AND DATEDIFF(t1.create_time, #{param1.beginDate}) >= 0
AND DATEDIFF(t1.create_time, #{param1.endDate}) <= 0
